title: "lel" and "kek"
body:
Why are people so intent on making themselves sound stupid?

All I hear in game is something along the lines of, "lelelel u so shit kek" when  someone dies, or "lelel" as a response to a genuine suggestion or strategy 

I mean I know it's the internet and all, but it's irritating and only makes the player seem like a complete moron. And what's funny is they usually end up losing anyway. It's just sad that I've seen this behaviour in nearly half of the games I've played on OCE (recently transferred from NA).

replies.body: top kek lelelelele u so mad git gud rekt XXXXXXXXXXDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDDD haha nubla scrublorb pwned

KEK is a translation of LOL. If you've ever played WoW, when a Hoard member types "LOL" other players see it as "KEK".

As for "lel" it's a corruption of "lol" I can't remember why we originally started using it though.

So it kinda comes off as if you're the idiot here since you don't know the origins of "lel" and "kek".
Op is mad ecks ddddddd, u mad bruh lel he mad cuz he got kekt.
they say it to make u mad as fk and clearly it worked since u mad a forum post KEK
